name: Anubis' Challenge
description: Anubis' Challenge is an action-based VR adventure game where you need to show your reaction and combat skills to withstand multiple waves of enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 980 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Intel Core i5-8600 (AMD Ryzen 5 2600X) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 1060 Storage: 5 GB available space
